<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>true</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sp_page_route_map</collection> <condition>current.portals.toString().indexOf("26f2fffb77322300454792718a1061e5") > -1 || previous.portals.toString().indexOf("26f2fffb77322300454792718a1061e5") > -1</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Prevent page route modification for MESP</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Mobile Employee Service Portal configurations are required for the Mobile Native Application and cannot be modified."));
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-03-11 18:16:04</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>25cfbaf67300330018eea18d4ef6a7cd</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Prevent page route modification for MESP</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Webviews for mobile" source="sn_me_webview">0d30eeec77eb2300454792718a106177</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Webviews for mobile">0d30eeec77eb2300454792718a106177</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_25cfbaf67300330018eea18d4ef6a7cd</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-03-20 06:37:54</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=25cfbaf67300330018eea18d4ef6a7cd"/> </record_update>
